TopicTitle: (NADI) (BluPlanet Inc.) KiG-105! Atmospheric Jets At Its Best!

Articles.Content:
We here at NADI, now a branch of BluPlanet Inc., are proud to present our newest jet, the KiG-105! Bob, trying to win a bet with Bill that Jeb will fly anything, told the engineers to build the craziest thing that our five year old designers could come up with! The result is this magnificent beauty of a plane. To some, it's the ugliest thing that they've ever seen, and those people were never seen again! Anyway, after spending a couple hours on it, we here at NADI find it a sexier beast than you (Don't Google sexy beast. Please don't).

Due to some problems with the landing gear, we decided to throw them away completely and just launch it on an SRB. Needless to say, it works and now we need to sell it! Of course, this craft needs special attention before it can fly successfully. But first, pictures!

Now for the flight steps:

1.) Engage jet engines, wait for the thrust to get to 120kn.

2.) Engage SRB and ASAS.

3.) Declamp the clamps.

4.) Wait about 4 seconds, decouple the SRB and immediately pull up (default button is W) to avoid clipping the SRB and losing your flight control systems.

4.) Do a barrel roll.

5.) ???

6.) Profit!
